body: At 3rd level, a savage technologist adds her Strength modifier on Diplomacy checks when interacting with tribal cultures. She can expend 2 rounds of rage (even if not raging) to add a bonus equal to 1/2 her barbarian level on a Diplomacy check.
name: Primal Magnetism
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Technology in the world/Archtypes/Technology-Themed Archetypes/Savage Technologist/Primal Magnetism
